description: Leeds striker Patrick Bamford is reportedly on a "long list" of players Blackburn are looking at as potential signings.
title: Leeds United: Blackburn eye Bamford and Gelhardt to leave
title_page: Leeds United: Blackburn eye Bamford and Gelhardt to leave - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Leeds United striker Patrick Bamford is on a "long list" of players Blackburn Rovers are looking at as potential signings in January. (Lancashire Telegraph), external
Hull City are close to the loan signing of Leeds forward Joe Gelhardt - who was wanted by ambitious League One side Wrexham. (Goal), external
